description: Pay less than $100 per adjustable dumbbell.

description: From special editions of beloved books to super-handy book accessories, here's what you should gift the bookworms this year.

description: Both the iPad and iPad Air are on sale today.

author: Erik Adams
description: The Triplets of Belleville’s Sylvain Chomet returns with an innovative animated biopic about an equally innovative French filmmaker.
title: A Magnificent Life Review

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Our latest demo of the pixel-art, perspective-shifting '90s-set survival horror game Holstin honestly blew us away – and we say that very rarely of any game. If the rest of Holstin is as polished and carefully crafted, it will be considered a survival horror classic in a decade’s time. We were that impressed by what I’ve seen and played of it so far. Here are five reasons why you should play Holstin when it's finally released.
title: Holstin: 5 Reasons to Play This Phenomenal Pixel-Art Survival Horror Game

author: Eric Song
description: Pick up one of the most powerful gaming laptops on the market for well under $3K.
title: Grab the Powerful HP Omen Max 16 RTX 5090 Gaming Laptop for an Incredible Price

author: Michael Cripe
description: Friends, loved ones, and fellow actors have gathered to remember actor Jonathan Joss after he was fatally shot June 1, 2025.
title: Chris Pratt and Nick Offerman Among Those Paying Tribute to Jonathan Joss Following Fatal Shooting

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: As the Doctor Who wraps up its latest season, we explore why the series gave up on Ncuti Gatwa’s Fifteenth Doctor much too soon.
title: Doctor Who Gave Up on the Fifteenth Doctor Much Too Soon

author: Eric Song
description: The best watch for iPhone.
title: The Apple Watch Series 10 Drops to the Lowest Price Just in Time for Father's Day

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: PlayStation's next State of Play is set for June 4 and promises an over 40-minute look at the future of PS5. This watch guide will provide you with everything you need to know to watch the big show and what you can expect from it.
title: PlayStation State of Play June 2025: How to Watch and What to Expect

author: Chris Reed
description: LEGO Hogwarts Castle - The Main Tower (set #76454) is the latest piece of LEGO's ambitious, multi-year, modular Hogwarts Castle. When complete, it will be a truly massive build.
title: We Build LEGO Harry Potter Hogwarts Castle - The Main Tower

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Six weeks after releasing in theaters, Ryan Coogler's Sinners is available to watch at home. Here's how.
title: Sinners Hits Digital After Passing $350 Million at Global Box Office

author: Eric Song
description: Double your Nintendo Switch 2 storage capacity for only $36.
title: Walmart Has a 256GB Nintendo Switch 2 MicroSDXC Express Card For Way Cheaper Than Everyone Else

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Resolution Games has revealed a debut gameplay trailer for Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked, and confirmed a late 2025 release window and launch platforms.
title: Demeo X Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked Reveals Debut Gameplay Trailer, Confirms Release Window and Launch Platforms

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: IGN can exclusively reveal that WOW - Women of Wrestling is gearing up to release its first-ever collectible card game, and it will feature such fan-favorite WOW Superheroes as Chainsaw, The Beast, Penelope Pink, Kandi Krush, Gloria Glitter, Tormenta, Ariel Sky, Americana, Princess Aussie, Jessie Jones, and Abilene Maverick.
title: WOW - Women of Wrestling Reveals First-Ever Collectible Card Game With 11 WOW Superheroes

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign shares quite a bit with its predecessor Elden Ring, from its gameplay to its lore and history. It also seems to carry some of its technical nuances, according to a new breakdown from the tech experts at Digital Foundry.
title: Tech Experts Say Elden Ring Nightreign's Quality Mode Makes 'No Practical Sense' On Any Console

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel had no choice but to spoil the appearance of Red Hulk in trailers for Captain America: Brave New World, the film's director has insisted — despite many fans believing the villain should have been kept under wraps.
title: Marvel Had to Spoil Red Hulk in Captain America: Brave New World Trailers, Director Insists: 'It's Just So Hard to Keep Anything Secret in Today’s Day and Age'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Amid excitement and disbelief at the quality of The Witcher 4 Unreal Engine 5 tech demo, developer CD Projekt has issued a statement insisting it is not a gameplay showcase and therefore does not represent actual The Witcher 4 gameplay footage.
title: The Witcher 4 Tech Demo Does Not 'Fully Represent the Final Game,' CD Projekt Clarifies: 'Visuals Reflect the Direction We're Taking'

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: The Karate Kid Ultimate Six-Movie Collection is now available to preorder at Amazon for $219.99. Its release date is still to be determined.
title: The Karate Kid Ultimate 6-Movie Collection Is Up for Preorder

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Walt Disney World's upcoming Cars land will be called Piston Peak National Park and will be part of the "largest expansion in the history of Magic Kingdom," Disney has announced.
title: Cars Land at Walt Disney World Called Piston Peak National Park, Part of 'Largest Expansion in the History of Magic Kingdom'

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Warner Bros. reportedly wanted Transformers director Michael Bay to make a Man of Steel sequel starring Henry Cavill before the DC Universe was overhauled and James Gunn set about rebooting Superman.
title: Warner Bros. Reportedly Wanted a Michael Bay Man of Steel Sequel Starring Henry Cavill, Before James Gunn Was Brought in to Reboot Superman

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has praised Nintendo Switch 2, and said the upcoming console realises the vision of the late Nintendo president Satoru Iwata, who worked on the concept for the original Switch platform before he passed away in 2015.
title: Switch 2 Worthy of Late Nintendo President Satoru Iwata's Vision, Nvidia Says, Boasts 'Most Advanced Graphics Ever' for Portable Device

author: Eric Van Allen
description: The challenge of playing Elden Ring Nightreign solo has been a hot-button issue since the game's launch, but director Junya Ishizaki has confirmed solo clears are quite doable. He knows, because he's cleared every boss in Nightreign already, by himself.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign's Director Has Soloed Every Boss Without Relics, And Wants Players To Know It's 'Very Possible' To See Everything

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Following the release of AI Darth Vader into Fortnite, Epic has announced plans to let people create their own AI NPCs in the all-encompassing battle royale.
title: AI Darth Vader Was the Beginning: Epic Reveals Plans to Let People Create Their Own AI NPCs in Fortnite

author: Lex Briscuso
description: If you were sad that Squid Game is finally coming to a close, dry those eyes — because we just might be getting a spin-off series of the Netflix hit. That is, if creator Hwang Dong-hyuk has anything to say about it. The series boss recently opened up about what he would do if he was able to make a spin-off show, and honestly, we’re into it.
title: Squid Game Creator Reveals Idea for Spin-Off Series: 'I Want to Show What They Did'

author: Ben Williams
description: To get the best value out of the PlayStation Days of Play deals in the UK, here are the best bargains on consoles, games, controllers, PS Plus memberships, and accessories.
title: Best PlayStation Days of Play Deals for the UK

author: Logan Plant
description: After spending the last 30 years grazing the fields of Moo Moo Farm and Moo Moo Meadows, Cow has taken the spotlight as the biggest breakout star of Mario Kart World's enormous character roster. So when Nintendo invited us to a roundtable interview with Mario Kart World Producer Kosuke Yabuki, we knew we had to ask him about the beloved bovine.
title: Does Cow Eat Beef? We Asked the Mario Kart World Producer

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Mario Kart World is just two days away, and fan expectations are rightfully high. It’s the flagship launch game for Nintendo Switch 2, the first open world in the series, the follow-up to the hugely successful Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, and on top of all that, it’s Nintendo’s first $80 game since the N64 days, which has caused no shortage of internet discourse. There’s a lot riding on this one, so I’m pleased to report that after spending roughly five hours with unrestricted access to the final build, I’m confident Mario Kart World’s thrilling racing will kick off Nintendo’s eighth generation with a rocket start, even if I’m still not completely sold on its open-world exploration.
title: Mario Kart World: The Final Preview

author: Simon Cardy
title: Mario Kart World's Open World Isn't What You Think It Is

author: Bo Moore
description: If you’re after a quality gaming controller with plenty of ways to customize its feel in games, the Nacon Revolution X Unlimited awaits.
title: Nacon Revolution X Unlimited Review

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Nintendo Switch 2 World Tour is a charming, light experience that grants fascinating context to the hardware it’s designed around, and it’d be great if all Switch 2 owners could check it out in between Mario Kart World sessions on launch day. Instead, everyone has to decide if it’s worth their $10 to learn about the Switch 2 cartridge slot and watch an HDR fireworks display, and the whole conversation surrounding Welcome Tour has suffered because of Nintendo’s irritating decision to charge for it.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour: So, Is it Worth $10?

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Are you ready for a totally jawsome comeback? We've got an exclusive first look at IDW and Mattel's upcoming Street Sharks series.
title: The Street Sharks Are Back in New IDW Publishing Series

author: Tom Phillips
description: As fans wait for a crumb of news on Mass Effect 5, the game's director has suggested at least one small returning feature will remain in the upcoming sequel.
title: Amid Wait for Mass Effect 5, Director Seemingly Confirms Returning Feature

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Epic Games and CD Projekt have shown off a stunning tech demo of The Witcher 4 running on Unreal Engine 5.
title: Stunning The Witcher 4 Unreal Engine 5 Tech Demo Shows Open-World Running on Base PS5 at 60fps — With Ray Tracing

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Sony has confirmed a State of Play showcase for tomorrow, June 4. Here's what to expect.
title: Sony Confirms State of Play PlayStation Showcase for Tomorrow, Will Last 40+ Minutes

author: Luke Reilly
description: F1 25 is a far broader and better package than last year’s installment, and it’s comfortably the strongest the series has been since the fan favourite F1 2020.
title: F1 25 Review

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Get your first look at Deadcam, a new "analog survival horror" game that uses a '90's found-footage VHS camcorder aesthetic to scare you through a series of files (i.e. encounters). Deadcam launches into Steam Early Access on June 23 with its first file, a J-horror inspired story set in an abandoned school, and four more files will be added over the course of the Early Access period.
title: Deadcam, a Found-Footage '90s-Inspired Horror Game, Announced for PC

author: Vikki Blake
description: Another day, another Hollow Knight: Silksong SteamDB update that's whipped information-starved Hollow Knight fans into a frenzy. Could this one finally be the one?
title: Another Day, Another Hollow Knight: Silksong Steam Update — Could We Finally Get a Release Date This Week?

author: Tom Phillips
description: Game of Thrones writer George R.R. Martin has shared his thoughts on the newly-announced film version of Elden Ring — and it sounds like he's pretty positive about the upcoming adaptation.
title: Game of Thrones Writer George R. R. Martin Weighs in on 'Kickass' Elden Ring Movie Plans

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nick Frost has offered his first thoughts on playing Hagrid in HBO's upcoming Harry Potter TV series, and said he felt a need to not just copy what had come before.
title: HBO Harry Potter TV Series' Nick Frost Talks Hagrid Portrayal, and Need to Not Copy Movies: 'I'm Never Going to Try and Be Robbie'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Stellar Blade director and producer Kim Hyung Tae reportedly "fully supports" mods and is looking forward to trying them out.
title: Stellar Blade Director Can't Wait to See Our PC Mods

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has reportedly begun shipping Switch 2 branded 'Out of Stock' signs to retailers, before the console has even gone on sale.
title: Days Before Switch 2's Release Date, Nintendo Ships Official 'Out of Stock' Signs to Retailers

author: Vikki Blake
description: Private servers are coming to Dune: Awakening, albeit with "concessions" to ensure players retain the large-scale aspects of multiplayer worlds. Here's how it works.
title: Dune: Awakening's Rentable Private Servers Available at Launch — Here's What You Do (And Don't) Get

author: Tom Phillips
description: Tony Gilroy, creator of critically-acclaimed Star Wars series Andor, has said he had to fight "hard" for the show's Season 2 budget after being told by Disney that "streaming is dead."
title: Star Wars Andor Creator 'Fought Hard' for $650m Budget After Disney Declared 'Streaming Is Dead'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Kojima Productions recently announced that VTuber Usada Pekora will be making a guest appearance in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach. However, this surprise cameo seems to have ruffled the feathers of some rather vocal Japanese Death Stranding fans on social media, some of whom are now proclaiming that they won’t buy the game anymore.
title: VTuber Usada Pekora Is in Death Stranding 2, and While Some Japanese Fans Hate It, Others Note Hideo Kojima Games Always Have Unexpected Crossovers

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening global release times, including early access, confirmed. Here's when you'll be able to play in your timezone.
title: Dune: Awakening Global Release Times, Including Early Access, Confirmed

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Activision has pulled controversial Call of Duty adverts placed inside Black Ops 6 and Warzone weapon loadouts, insisting they were a "feature test" published "in error."
title: Activision Insists Heavily Criticized Call of Duty Black Ops 6 and Warzone Ads in Loadout Menus Were a 'Test' Published 'In Error,' Strips Them Out Following Backlash

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Elden Ring Nightreign is now up to 3.5 million copies sold after five days on sale, with its Steam user review rating improving from 'mixed' to 'mostly positive.' FromSoftware has also confirmed Duo Expeditions are on the way.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Duo Expeditions on the Way, FromSoftware Confirms as Sales Jump to 3.5 Million

author: Michael Higham
description: The DXRacer Martian gaming chair may not be for relaxation, but its ergonomic support and build quality are incredible even at a premium price.
title: The DXRacer Martian Gaming Chair Succeeds With Its Ergonomic Support for Proper Posture

author: Adam Mathew
description: If your backlog isn’t looking daunting enough already, a fresh crop of digital deals is here to test your willpower.
title: AU Deals: Half Off LEGO Horizon, Personas, Final Fantasies, GTAs, Metal Gears, and More!

author: Eric Song
description: Features Dolby Atmos surround sound and a discrete wireless subwoofer.
title: The $79 TCL Alto 8 Plus 2.1.2ch Soundbar Is a Big Upgrade From Your TV's Built-In Speakers
